lead_paragraph: Shirking responsibility is not in Ajinkya Rahane's nature and the India batsman is ready to shoulder more when his team experience using the Decision Review System (DRS) in the test series against England starting on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: India's Rahane Ready to Take DRS Responsibility
headline.main: India's Rahane Ready to Take DRS Responsibility
